comment.author: 32536320@N05
comment._content: Once there was a network of railway refreshment rooms around the state, where the train would stop an alloted time and everyone from the train would storm the refreshment room and have a cup of tea and a piece of fruitcake or something else.  We still have a rail network, but much smaller, less trains and no refreshment rooms as such.

comment.author: 7517447@N07
comment._content: From the days when service counted for something. 7 staff behind the counter.
